idea-plugin.name: ayu Dark Color Scheme
idea-plugin.description:
ayu Dark color scheme for all of your favorite JetBrains IDEs!
Currently supported IDEs: - IntelliJ IDEA, Android Studio, PyCharm, WebStorm, Rider, GoLand
More Information: https://github.com/qyurila/ayu-dark-jetbrains
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Initial Release
Optimized IDEs: - IntelliJ IDEA 2022.1.3 - Android Studio 2021.2.1 - PyCharm 2022.1.3 - WebStorm 2022.1.3 - Rider 2022.1.2 - GoLand 2022.1.3
